name: Private Ho Chi Minh city and Cu Chi tunnels tour 1 day
description: This is an interesting combination tour between Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnel which bring you different experiences: one is busy city life; another one is underground life during the war. Start the day the right way - with an up close and personal history lesson on guerrilla warfare. Adventuring the most impressive tunnel in the world - the chance to understand life in the "underground city" with full facilities such as hospital, school, kitchen, meeting room.... during the Vietnam war and experiencing Ho Chi Minh City.
